snippet.title: Anode Trailer
snippet.description:
Anode is a fast-paced action puzzle game that challenges you to connect like colors, then detonate them into a big chain reaction!  Fans of Columns or Puzzle Fighter will be right at home!

Anode is available on Steam now, check it out here: http://store.steampowered.com/app/401120/

Anode fully supports several single-player game modes, and competitive same-screen multiplayer.  Game controllers are fully supported, or use keyboard/mouse.  Earn achievements, compare scores via online leaderboards, and more!
